response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. Considering this and the high quality of our product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands in the long run. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
